TEXT.TITLE: CHEYENNE SOFTWARE <CHEY> TO ISSUE NEWS RELEASE
TEXT.BODY: Cheyenne Software Inc, whose stock has been halted on NASDAQ, said it will issue a news release soon. The company declined to comment on the nature of the news release. Reuter
